name: Google Ads
description: Fetches various performance data from the Google Ads API, including campaigns, ad groups, ads, and audience segments.

retrieve_campaign_metrics.description: Retrieves overall performance metrics for campaigns (e.g., total clicks, cost, conversions per campaign). Use this for high-level summaries of how each campaign is performing as a whole.

login_customer_id.description: Your Google Ads Manager Account ID (MCC) without dashes (e.g., '1234567890'). This is the account that has administrative access to the customer account being queried.

customer_id.description: The Google Ads Customer ID of the specific account you want to query data from (e.g., '1234567890'). This is the account whose campaign data will be retrieved.

date_ranges.description: List of date ranges. Supported formats: 'last_7_days', 'prev_7_days', or 'YYYY-MM-DD_YYYY-MM-DD' (e.g., ["last_7_days", "2023-01-01_2023-01-31"]). Defaults to ["last_7_days", "prev_7_days"].

date_range.description: The date range this data represents

data.description: Campaign data for the specified date range
